name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitHub: Preserve URL fragment in auth flow

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When GitHub redirects you to auth, it'll eventually return you to your original URL, but will lose the fragment part of the URLâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When GitHub redirects you to auth, it'll eventually return you to your original URL, but will lose the fragment part of the URL (e.g. "#L104"). This extension preserves the URL fragment across the redirect.
